entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
